author: __flcl
content:
<@543900561460822016> do you guys have any plans to replace or rename eth_gasPrice with eth_baseFee or so? 
Just want to finalize https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/486 and I'm a bit not sure whether people may want to get  `maxFeePerBlobGas` estimation instead of just most recent `blobBaseFee`. 'd like to hear your opinion
